text: Dove Cameron revealed her bra cup size via Twitter on Thursday. The former Disney Channel star responded to a fan who tweeted :'I really wan na know what @ DoveCameron ’ s secret is to her cleavage.'' I have c cups. it ’ s ain ’ t no secret. I've had C's since I was 14. It's just a body. I just let it do its thing,'answered the 22 - year - old bombshell.
